html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11382024-10-25FIN
ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
Cooperative Credit Associations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Principal Protected Notes Regulations and the Deposit Type Instrument Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the PRINCIPAL PROTECTED NOTES REGULATIONS AND THE DEPOSIT TYPE INSTRUMENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the deposit-type instruments (DTI) and the Principal Protected Notes Regulations (PPN Regulations) definitions in the DTI regulations and the PPN Regulations by introducing a reference to the equivalent Bank Act definitions; and (2) ensure that term deposit products currently distinctly captured by the respective definitions continue to be captured as such following the end of publication of all Canadian Dollar Offered Rate tenors, and its full replacement by the Canadian Overnight Repo Rate Average effective June 28, 2024
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0212 Publication Date: 2024-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the PRINCIPAL PROTECTED NOTES REGULATIONS AND THE DEPOSIT TYPE INSTRUMENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the deposit-type instruments (DTI) and the Principal Protected Notes Regulations (PPN Regulations) definitions in the DTI regulations and the PPN Regulations by introducing a reference to the equivalent Bank Act definitions; and (2) ensure that term deposit products currently distinctly captured by the respective definitions continue to be captured as such following the end of publication of all Canadian Dollar Offered Rate tenors, and its full replacement by the Canadian Overnight Repo Rate Average effective June 28, 2024
